author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY WELL TO THE EAST-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary:
...HONE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY WELL TO THE EAST-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
 As of 2:00 AM HST Fri Aug 23
 the center of Hone was located near 16.2, -145.6
 with movement W at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
